channel.title: Hackathon and Community Build in KC - Jeep?
channel.description:
We are looking to modify this Jeep as well as several of the Maserati Cars for our upcoming community build and Hack-a-thon in November. It's big, but seems like a very cool car. We especially like that it has a remote.
https://www.amazon.com/Best-Choice-Products-Control-Suspension/dp/B072865HYJ
Anyway, just wondering if anyone has built these before and seeing if you have any insights, tips, or ideas to contribute. We'll make sure to post a manual once we have it ready!

Anyway, just wondering if anyone has built these before and seeing if you have any insights, tips, or ideas to contribute. We’ll make sure to post a manual once we have it ready!
